lines.text: Do you know how to catch one of us topless dancers?
I'll tell you. With a booby trap!
You know, Ma, I think the boys are beginning to notice me a little.

[after having sex with a white man]
Well, Trader Horn. How do you like exploring in the African bush?
[a woman with three bra cups walks past]

[to the camera]
That's nothing. You ought to see what she has two of.
This is the dullest party I've ever been too.
Well, I would but I can't find my clothes!
[the camera zooms out to reveal a fully nude Audrey and her friend sitting on the floor while there is a full orgy around them]

[after having sex]
Gee willikers! I didn't think anything as exciting as this would happen to me until I was at least 16 years old!
[a young woman completely removes all her clothing while standing before a man with a notepad]
I can't give you an order right now... but thanks for showing me your lines.
